project_descr: Providing technical and administrative support to DSWD to implement BUB.

outputs.output_descr: The project has two aims: 1) to strengthen governance hubs to provide technical support to BUB implementation. 2) To provide immediate administrative boost to BUB implementation through use of UNDP procurement and cash grant system.
